expo.name: VibeChat
expo.description: Making group chats great again. Your friend group chats with custom ChatGPT in them.

infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: VibeChat needs access to your calendar to help you schedule events with your AI friends.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: VibeChat needs full access to your calendar to create and edit events with your AI friends.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: VibeChat needs access to your reminders to help you manage tasks.
infoPlist.NSRemindersFullAccessUsageDescription: VibeChat needs full access to your reminders to create and manage tasks with your AI friends.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: VibeChat needs access to your photos to let you share them with your friends.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: VibeChat needs access to your camera to let you take photos and share them.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: VibeChat needs access to your microphone to let you send voice messages.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: VibeChat needs access to your photos to save images you download.
